statements: SELECT * FROM token_balances WHERE token_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM token_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT token_id, account_id, balance FROM token_balances WHERE account_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT * FROM token_balances WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT token_id, account_id, balance FROM token_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT token_id, account_id, balance FROM token_balances WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY balance DESC, token_id ASC
SELECT * FROM token_balances WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM token_balances GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 5000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC
SELECT token_id, account_id, balance FROM token_balances WHERE token_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000')
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM token_balances
SELECT * FROM token_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT token_id, balance FROM token_balances WHERE balance > 100;
SELECT transfer_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM token_transfers WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT transfer_id, transfer_date FROM token_transfers ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT token_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transfers FROM token_transfers GROUP BY token_id;
SELECT * FROM token_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT token_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM token_balances GROUP BY token_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM token_balances WHERE balance > 100;
SELECT token_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_transferred FROM token_transfers GROUP BY token_id;
SELECT * FROM token_transfers WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM token_balances WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT transfer_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, timestamp FROM token_transfers WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, user_id, token_type, amount, record_date FROM token_records WHERE token_type = 'ETH';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM token_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transfer_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM token_transfers WHERE receiver_id = 201 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM token_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM token_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM token_balances GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT t.transfer_id, t.sender_id, t.receiver_id, t.amount, tr.record_date FROM token_transfers t JOIN token_records tr ON t.transfer_id = tr.record_id;
SELECT user_id, token_type, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM token_records GROUP BY user_id, token_type;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM token_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, timestamp FROM transfers WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE type = 'deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM token_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM token_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transfers WHERE sender_id = 123 AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, transactions.amount FROM users INNER JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.user_id WHERE transactions.type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transactions.timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM balances;
SELECT account_id, balance, token_id FROM balances WHERE balance > 100;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM balances JOIN accounts ON balances.account_id = accounts.account_id;
SELECT account_name, token_name, amount FROM balances JOIN accounts ON balances.account_id = accounts.account_id JOIN tokens ON balances.token_id = tokens.token_id;
SELECT * FROM transfers WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM balances WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY token_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM balances WHERE token_id = 1 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT t.token_name, b.balance FROM tokens t JOIN balances b ON t.token_id = b.token_id WHERE b.balance < 50;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts a JOIN balances b ON a.account_id = b.account_id WHERE b.balance < 100 ORDER BY account_name;
SELECT t.token_name, SUM(b.balance) AS total_balance FROM tokens t JOIN balances b ON t.token_id = b.token_id GROUP BY t.token_name ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
